name: AppStore - Screenshot Builder (iOS & iPad)
description:
Create app screenshots for AppStore.


Correct sizes and gaps enable you to make beautiful panoramic sequences for you app on Apple Store



iPhone:

  • iPhone 13 Pro Max
  • iPhone 13 / 13 Pro
  • iPhone 13 Mini
  • iPhone 12 Pro Max
  • iPhone 12 / 12 Pro
  • iPhone 12 Mini
  • iPhone 11 / XR / XS Max
  • iPhone X / XS
  • iPhone 6s Pllus / 7 Plus / 8 Plus
  • iPhone 6 / 6s / 7 / 8
  • iPhone SE


iPad:

  • iPad Pro 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5th gen
  • iPad Air 1 / 2 / 3 / 4th gen
  • iPad Mini 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6th gen
